sentences.en: ...a large and beautiful garden full of ancient gnarled trees.
sentences.cn: ...一座长满各种形状的古树的大型美丽花园。

sentences.en: An old , old ivy vine, gnarled and decayed at the roots, climbed the brick wall.
sentences.cn: 一棵老极了的长春藤, 枯萎的根纠结在一块, 枝干攀在砖墙的半腰上.

sentences.en: His hands were gnarled with arthritis.
sentences.cn: 他的双手因患关节炎而扭曲变形。

sentences.en: I met a gnarled old sea captain yesterday.
sentences.cn: 我昨天遇到一位外表粗糙饱经风霜的老船长.

sentences.en: It was easy enough for him to clamber up the gnarled trunk.
sentences.cn: 他攀上这扭曲的树干,倒还容易.

sentences.en: My gnarled fingers fumbled as I tried to spring the latch.
sentences.cn: 当我试着跳门闩的时候,我的节手指摸索.

sentences.en: Sailor as he was, it was easy enough for him to clamber up the gnarled trunk.
sentences.cn: 他虽说是个水手,攀上这扭曲的树干, 倒还容易.

sentences.en: The elderly white - haired officer had the gnarled and menacing brow and blazing, powerful eyes.
sentences.cn: 这位白发军官双目炯炯有神, 眉宇间露出一副执拗的凶相.

sentences.en: The fingers were gnarled, lumpy, with long, curving nails suggestive of animal claws.
sentences.cn: 手指粗糙，关节突出，指甲又长又弯，让人想起动物的爪子。

sentences.en: The gnarled , bearded features of homer are dear to me, for he , too , knew blindness.
sentences.cn: 多瘤而又蓄有长须的 荷马让 我感觉尤为亲切.因为他了解盲人.

sentences.en: The gnarled , bearded features of Homer are dear to me, for he, too, knew blindness.
sentences.cn: 中楣石柱的复制品, 我意识到向前冲锋的的雅典武士的匀称和谐美.

sentences.en: The tree has gnarled red branches and deep green leaves.
sentences.cn: 这棵树的树枝扭曲多瘤且呈红色，树叶则是深绿色。

sentences.en: The wind has gnarled this old tree.
Two stunted apple trees raised their gnarled andbranchesside of the wicket gate.
sentences.cn: 边门两旁,是两株瘦小的苹果树那多节的桠枝.

sentences.en: What then, you may ask, is a gnarled walker?
sentences.cn: 你也许就会问了, 多节行者是 什么 ?

trans.tran_cn: （树、树干、树枝）扭曲的，多瘤的，多节的，（手、手指）粗糙的
trans.tran_en: a gnarled tree or branch is rough and twisted with hard lumps

trans.tran_cn: 把…扭曲；长木瘤（gnarl的过去分词）
